trans-unit.source: Specifies how the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlTextReader"></xref> or <xref href="System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader"></xref> handle entities.
trans-unit.target: Especifica como o <xref href="System.Xml.XmlTextReader"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader"> </xref> processar entidades.

trans-unit.source: Expands character entities and returns general entities as <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType.EntityReference> nodes.
trans-unit.target: Expanda as entidades de caráter e devolve entidades gerais como <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType.EntityReference>nós.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType.EntityReference>

trans-unit.source: You must call <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ResolveEntity%2A> to see what the general entities expand to.
trans-unit.target: Tem de chamar <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ResolveEntity%2A>para ver o que expanda as entidades gerais para.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ResolveEntity%2A>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to optimize entity handling by only expanding the entity the first time it is used.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite-lhe otimizar a entidade processamento expandindo apenas a entidade é utilizado pela primeira vez.

trans-unit.source: When set to ExpandCharEntities, a reader call to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.GetAttribute%2A> method expands all entities (both general and character entities).
trans-unit.target: Quando definido como ExpandCharEntities, um leitor a chamada para o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.GetAttribute%2A>método expande todas as entidades (entidades gerais e de caráter).</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.GetAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Expands all entities and returns the expanded nodes.
trans-unit.target: Expande a todas as entidades e devolve os nós expandido.

trans-unit.source: The entity text is expanded in place of the entity references.
trans-unit.target: O texto de entidade é expandido em vez das referências de entidade.
